snippet: A judge followed a jury’s recommendation and sentenced an avowed anti-Semite to death for the fatal shootings of three people at Kansas Jewish sites.
abstract: Johnson County Judge Thomas Kelly Ryan follows jury recommendation and sentences Frazier Glenn Miller Jr to death for anti-Semitism-fueled murder of three people in Kansas Jewish sites in April 2014.
lead_paragraph: A judge followed a jury’s recommendation and sentenced an avowed anti-Semite to death for the fatal shootings of three people at Kansas Jewish sites.

headline.main: Kansas: Death Sentence Imposed on Man Who Sought to Kill Jews
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Death Sentence Imposed on Man Who Sought to Kill Jews
